This is the problem with all things raw and uncensored. If law was in place or some from of moderation was set in motion. The standard that was set in the white paper would be bias. You also have the pleasure of that garble being on your Hard drive as well. 

I would usher the DEVS to look at the simple fact common law isn't a bad thing. Sure you have the freedom to say what you want. But others even thos that believe in free speech do not want to hear everything. 

Perhaps a way to mark and remove content per user by the user is needed
